data.name: Starlight Drifter - Wallpapers
data.detailed_description:
This DLC pack contains all of the CG scenes from Starlight Drifter as super high resolution 4K images for use as computer wallpapers.

As the game is currently in Early Access, we will regularly add new wallpapers to this DLC pack as new CG scenes are created for the game.

Package currently contains 10 separate wallpapers in high resolution .png format.

The wallpaper pack once purchased will be downloaded as a new Wallpapers folder in the games base directory, new wallpapers will be added monthly throughout early access.
